last_episode_to_air.name: Sisters
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lou, Amy and Lisa head to Vancouver for a girls' trip. Lisa is caught in the middle when truths are revealed between sisters that could threaten to tear them apart.

name: Heartland

next_episode_to_air.name: World on a String
next_episode_to_air.overview: Amy works with a unique client whose sanctuary is at risk of closure while a secret Katie's been keeping is revealed and shocks Lou.

overview: Life is hard on the Flemings' ranch in the Alberta foothills where abused or neglected horses find refuge with a kind, hard-working family. Debts abound and the bank is about to foreclose. Can they keep the ranch running?

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: Season nine of Heartland finds the Bartlett-Fleming clan navigating the new normal as each family member starts an exciting chapter, leaving past hurt and hardships behind. With the idyllic Alberta foothills as their backdrop, this tightknit family knows that any challenge can be met and every struggle can be overcome as long as they have each other.

seasons.name: Season 15
seasons.overview: Amy embraces the future - raising her daughter, working with the horses who continue to heal her, branching out into a new phase of her life and profession. She is moving forward and feels determined to leave a legacy. In fact, Jack, Lisa, Lou and Tim have all decided that now is not the time to pull back, but to ramp up, to create new dreams and fulfill old ones. And, as they always do, the family will pull together to help each other...and will ultimately end up stronger than ever.

seasons.name: Season 16
seasons.overview: Season 16 finds Amy and the rest of the family making bold strides towards their futures. Amy will be challenged by the horses that need her help, but she’ll also open herself up to the possibility of new friendships and maybe even romance. Amy’s daughter Lyndy will follow in her mom’s footsteps as her talents with horses start to develop over the course of the season. Jack and Lisa will find themselves living out the dreams they’ve both worked so hard to achieve. Just as Lou and Peter have recommitted as a couple, Katie will struggle to find her place in the world and in her family. Tim has never been happier in his marriage to Jessica, but a ghost from his past will force him to reconsider mistakes he made years ago and seek ways to atone for them.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.overview: Amy and Lou Fleming, and their grandfather Jack, deal with life after their mother's death while a new ranch hand, Ty Borden, comes to live and work at Heartland.

episodes.name: After the Storm
episodes.overview: Lou sends an uncured horse back to its owner, which causes friction with Amy. Ty builds Amy a jumping ring and Jack decides to keep Ty on at Heartland.

episodes.name: Breaking Free
episodes.overview: High profile horse breeder Lisa Stillman asks Amy to help her with her horse, Promise. Lou holds a Heartland Open House to help bring in business.

episodes.name: Taking Chances
episodes.overview: Ben Stillman arrives at Heartland and his treatment of his horse Red angers everyone. Ashley lures Ty to Briar Ridge with a job offer.

episodes.name: The Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Lou decides to make a promotional video for Heartland. Ty's new job at Briar Ridge isn't going as planned. Scott gets Amy to help with a wild pony.

episodes.name: One Trick Pony
episodes.overview: Lou's boyfriend Carl arrives at Heartland with a couple of different proposals for Lou. His welcome, however, is both hot and cold.

episodes.name: Come What May
episodes.overview: Lou isn't pleased when a neighbouring rancher brings a pregnant mare named Melody to stay at Heartland. Ty is astonished when Jack asks him to join him on a cattle roundup.

episodes.name: Out of the Darkness
episodes.overview: The pressure is on when a famous race horse, Gallant Prince, is sent to Heartland to see if it can be rehabilitated.

episodes.name: Ghost From The Past
episodes.overview: An old girlfriend of Ty's shows up at Heartland and stirs up trouble. Lou is reunited with Sugarfoot, Mrs. Bell's miniature horse.

episodes.name: Born To Run
episodes.overview: Nick Harwell arrives to train Ben but becomes interested in buying Spartan. Mallory thinks Lou plans to re-home Copper and runs away with him, only to discover a plot to sell wild mustangs.

episodes.name: Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Tim's visit to Heartland causes sibling rivalry between Lou and Amy. Jack takes Lisa Stillman fishing on their second date.

episodes.name: Rising from the Ashes
episodes.overview: Disaster strikes when the barn erupts into flames and Jack's badly hurt getting the horses to safety.

episodes.name: Coming Together
episodes.overview: Amy finds herself working with the enemy when Ashley asks for her help. Amy's also preparing Spartan for the Fall Finale while Lou decides what to do about a job offer in New York.

episodes.name: Ghost Horse
episodes.overview: It's been four months since Ty's sudden and unexplained departure, and Amy has moved on and become used to working with Caleb Odell, Heartland's new stable hand. With Amy's 16th birthday just days away, Lou is busy planning a surprise birthday party for her sister.

episodes.name: Letting Go
episodes.overview: When Ty comes back to Heartland, he quickly realizes that profound changes have occurred in his absence. Caleb, the new ranch hand, seems to have taken over both his job and his place in Amy's heart.

episodes.name: Gift Horse
episodes.overview: When Tim gives Amy a beautiful Grand Prix jumper for her birthday, she's forced to make a difficult choice between a career in show jumping and her work at Heartland.

episodes.name: Dancing in the Dark
episodes.overview: The spring cattle drive is a much-anticipated event, and Lou hustles everyone out of the house at the crack of dawn for a secret all-day date with Scott. Simmering tensions rise to the surface as Amy seems more interested in getting roping tips from Caleb instead of riding with Ty.

episodes.name: Corporate Cowgirls
episodes.overview: Lou is forced to reconsider her choice to live and work at Heartland when her former New York colleagues arrive for a weekend equine retreat. Amy is unsure whether she can trust Ty.

episodes.name: Holding Fast
episodes.overview: Out for a ride along the river, Amy comes across an RCMP officer desperately trying to save a young boy from drowning. Scott misinterprets Nick Harwell's polo match invitation to Lou as a date. Mallory seeks Jack's advice on how to deal with her love life.

episodes.name: Sweetheart of the Rodeo
episodes.overview: With the annual Hudson Heritage Rodeo looming, everyone at Heartland gets roped into the action. Jack and Tim are forced to work together on the planning committee. Meanwhile, Lou is grooming Soraya to compete in the Queen of The Rodeo competition.

episodes.name: Summer's End
episodes.overview: In the middle of a heat wave, a cattle truck loaded with thirsty and overheated horses pulls into Heartland. Ty can hardly believe his eyes when the driver turns out to be his dad.

episodes.name: Showdown!
episodes.overview: Ty asks Amy to give their relationship another chance. Ashley makes a decision that surprises her mother and Lou. Cattle rustlers hit Big River Ranch, and the situation gets out of hand.

episodes.name: True Enough
episodes.overview: When Amy's teacher brings a horse named Boxer to Heartland, Amy learns a valuable lesson about fathers and daughters. Ty and Kit seem to be blissfully happy together. Lou catches Constable Rodriguez with another woman.

episodes.name: Starstruck!
episodes.overview: When Hollywood comes to Heartland, Amy is so starstruck, she loses track of what's really important in her life.

episodes.name: Divorce Horse
episodes.overview: Lisa meddles in Lou's business and personal life with disastrous results. Lisa brings a "cursed" horse for Amy to treat. The beautiful Andalusian named Diva Girl has been returned to Lisa by multiple owners.

episodes.name: Seismic Shifts
episodes.overview: Lou goes head to head with Big Alberta Oil when seismic surveyors force their way onto Heartland.

episodes.name: Do or Die
episodes.overview: Clint brings two tough kids on probation to Heartland forcing Ty to deal with a part of his past he'd rather forget.

episodes.name: Dark Horse
episodes.overview: Lou resurrects the Hudson Derby, stirring up an age-old grudge match between Jack and Tim.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Amy resorts to desperate measures when her horse Spartan is mysteriously stolen and reappears sold to Wes, the man who set fire to the Heartland barn.

episodes.name: Full Circle
episodes.overview: Amy heads into the mountains to visit a First Nations horse healer named Victor Whitetail, and leaves with a new understanding about horses, her mom and herself.

episodes.name: Step by Step
episodes.overview: Ty and Amy are finally forced to deal with their feelings for each other after a snowstorm strands them at Jack’s fishing cabin in the mountains.

episodes.name: Miracle
episodes.overview: Amy is thrust into the limelight when she performs a miracle on a traumatized horse and a video of the event is posted online.

episodes.name: Little Secrets
episodes.overview: Amy finds herself caught in the middle of a family crisis when she tries to help a girl and her horse recover from what appears to be a freak accident.

episodes.name: Man's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Jack's truck is on its way to rust bucket heaven, forcing him to find the courage to say goodbye to a part of his past.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Hanley Barn
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty spend the night in the "haunted" Hanley barn, trying to get to the bottom of a mystery.

episodes.name: Glory Days
episodes.overview: In the hopes of impressing Ashley, Caleb takes lessons in bulldogging from former rodeo champion Tim, who stubbornly refuses to acknowledge that he may no longer have what it takes. Kit and Ty sort out their lingering break-up issues as Ty assists Scott with the delivery of Kit's mare's foal. Lou invites Peter to manage his business from the Heartland facilities while his office undergoes renovation, and lives to regret it.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Ty and Amy clash over how best to raise an orphaned foal. Lou must defuse a potential lawsuit after fending off unwanted advances from an unscrupulous business client. Meanwhile, Val tries to connect with her newly-reconciled daughter Ashley and a cougar stalks the Heartland area.

episodes.name: The Starting Gate
episodes.overview: When Tim buys a racehorse from Lisa, he puts everything on the line, including Amy, to win big.

episodes.name: The Fix
episodes.overview: Ty protects his mother Lily from his abusive stepfather, who shows up at Heartland to win her back.

episodes.name: Broken Arrow
episodes.overview: Amy is upset when Ty flies off with Scott to a remote vet call on his last day before heading to vet school.

episodes.name: Eye of the Wolf
episodes.overview: Amy leads a rescue search to find Ty and Scott, whose plane has gone missing in a remote forested mountain area.

episodes.name: Catch and Release
episodes.overview: While the boys head off on a fishing trip, the girls are left back at Heartland to deal with the havoc caused by a dog, a porcupine and a herd of escaped cows.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: Victor Whitetail visits Heartland, leaving Tim to wonder if Victor was more than just friends with his ex-wife.

episodes.name: Quarantine
episodes.overview: Relationships are on shaky ground when Kit's horse, Daisy, comes down with Strangles and are put under quarantine. Kit decides to stay at Heartland to be with her horse. But Amy loses it when she finds out that Kit brought Daisy to Heartland almost straight after a rodeo where many horses had come down with strangles! Pegasus catches it and that brings mixed feelings, especially for Tim.

episodes.name: The Happy List
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty are at odds over his purchase of a vintage motorcycle while Caleb goes off to a rodeo in Montana despite Ashley's growing concerns about his life on the circuit.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: Amy faces a tough moral dilemma when she discovers Mr. Hanley has abandoned his horses and is on the brink of losing his farm.

episodes.name: Spin Out!
episodes.overview: Caleb struggles to get over the physical and emotional scars from his terrible accident as Amy tries to get him back on a horse and Tim doles out some tough love.

episodes.name: Ring of Fire
episodes.overview: When Amy follows in her mother's footsteps and enters a professional colt starting competition her gift with horses, and self-confidence, is put to the test.

episodes.name: In the Cards
episodes.overview: A surprise announcement by Peter throws Lou's wedding plans into disarray while Amy and Ty are forced to make difficult decisions about their futures.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Amy tries to pretend that nothing has changed when Ty returns to Heartland with a surprise guest.

episodes.name: What Dreams May Become
episodes.overview: Amy scratches the surface to discover Nick Harwell's problems with his polo ponies, Lou's life in Dubai and Tim's relationship with his jockey are not what they appear to be.

episodes.name: Road Curves
episodes.overview: When an unspoken attraction re-surfaces, Amy discovers that honesty might be the best policy, but it certainly isn't the easiest one.

episodes.name: Graduation
episodes.overview: A looming high school graduation and Spartan's near fatal bout with colic forces Amy to face where her future really lies.

episodes.name: Where the Truth Lies
episodes.overview: When Amy and Ty convince Sarah, the town recluse, to let them treat her sick horse at Heartland, the family helps her face the ghosts of her past..

episodes.name: Win, Place or Show
episodes.overview: Tim enlists Amy to ride Lightning Dexter in a big time stakes race when he finds out his girlfriend, Janice, has teamed up with the competition

episodes.name: Jackpot!
episodes.overview: Amy and Kit have to put their differences aside to on Caleb in a team-roping jackpot.

episodes.name: One Day
episodes.overview: When Amy is hired to do a horse clinic with a group of inmates, Ty is surprised to discover that one of them is a friend from his bad old days at the group home.

episodes.name: Local Hero
episodes.overview: Lou comes back from Dubai to spend time with the family. Ty and Amy discover where her father's rustled cattle are being pastured and the whole family rides out to bring them back.

episodes.name: Mood Swings
episodes.overview: When an irate Grant, Ty's travel buddy shows up at Heartland to punch out Ty for "kissing Blair" the disclosure puts Ty and Amy's relationship in jeopardy. Meanwhile finding out that their marriage was not legal puts Caleb and Ashley into a turmoil. All the relationship drama makes Lou question her marriage with Peter.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: Amy fights to keep Dexter in the family when she learns Tim is putting the horse up for sale in a claiming race.

episodes.name: Lost Song
episodes.overview: Jack is forced to revisit a rough patch in his marriage when he finds an unfinished song by Lyndy in her old guitar case.

episodes.name: The Road Home
episodes.overview: Jack is forced to revisit a rough patch in his marriage when he finds an unfinished song by Lyndy in her old guitar case.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Amy must deal with Stewart Forrest's unrealistic expectations when she works with his daughter and an elite jumper that may be too much horse for the girl to handle.

episodes.name: The River
episodes.overview: Lou helps Amy fight the lawsuit to save her sister's reputation and family business.

episodes.name: Never Surrender
episodes.overview: When a paralyzed military vet and ex-rodeo cowboy hires Amy to help sell his roping horse she sees an opportunity to re-train both horse and rider

episodes.name: Burning Down the House
episodes.overview: A horse crazy young boy comes to Heartland and quickly bonds with Amy, but his mother has a secret that could change everything for the Fleming family.

episodes.name: Passages
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty work through their trust issues as they train a pair of Clydesdale's, but it is an emergency at Heartland that reveals their true strength as a team when it matters most.

episodes.name: Finding Freedom
episodes.overview: Tim is having no luck tracking down Miranda and Shane since she dropped the bombshell that Shane is his son... until Shane --on his own-- surprises everyone by just showing up at Heartland. And Mallory entertains the idea of going with the recently-single-again Jake to the Spring Fling. There is however --as you might expect with Mallory-- a "but" attached.

episodes.name: Something in the Night
episodes.overview: When Tim is coerced to go with Jack on a secret mission Amy is left back at Heartland with Janice to get a young race horse ready for his maiden run meanwhile Ty has planned Amy a dinner but there has been an animal hiding in the trailer so they make a slight change of arrangements.

episodes.name: What's in a Name?
episodes.overview: When Tim reveals to the family that Shane is his son it throws everybody for a loop and threatens to ruin the traditional Bartlett-Fleming-Morris naming ceremony for Lou's baby girl.

episodes.name: Beyond Hell's Half Mile
episodes.overview: When Amy works with a chuck wagon horse she discovers an impediment that could put the entire team in danger and change the dynamics of a prominent chuck wagon family.

episodes.name: Never Let Go
episodes.overview: Amy helps to restore the confidence of a troubled, young trick-rider so that she can get back on her horse and perform again.

episodes.name: The Slippery Slope
episodes.overview: A friend from Jack's past shows up at Heartland when one of their old band mates passes away. Lou & Lisa secretly try to gather the other remaining members for a reunion performance to celebrate Jack's birthday.

episodes.name: Over the Rise
episodes.overview: When Shane arrives to stay for the summer, Tim tries to impress all three of his kids with a really cool Western day trip.

episodes.name: Nothing for Granted
episodes.overview: When Ty visits Mrs. Bell to thank her for paying his school fees he and Amy are surprised to learn she’s moved out of her home, and away from Sugarfoot.

episodes.name: Cover Me
episodes.overview: When Tim's young racehorse Cisco is stolen on the way to his maiden race, Amy and Ty get help tracking him down from an unlikely source – Ty's step-father, Wade.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.overview: When Amy bravely tries to heal an abused (and now extremely violent) racehorse Ty and Jack think she's finally bitten off more than she can chew.

episodes.name: Fool's Gold
episodes.overview: Ty's mother Lily returns to Heartland with shocking news about his father, and a secret that threatens her relationship with her son.

episodes.name: Road to Nowhere
episodes.overview: When Jack learns Ty is riding his bike solo to a remote lake to spread his father's ashes he decides to surprise Ty and join him for this meaningful road trip.

episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.overview: In an attempt to avoid hitting a wolf, Ty is badly injured when he crashes his bike on a remote road, leaving Jack to search for help in the middle of nowhere.

episodes.name: Working in a Dream
episodes.overview: Amy is roped into helping Tim project a positive image to the community, in hopes it will further his custody case for Shane.

episodes.name: Breaking Down and Building Up
episodes.overview: When tragedy strikes Amy must find a way to save Mr. Hanley's rescue horses from kill buyers.

episodes.name: Wild Horses
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty join Scott on a trip back to his old reservation to save a herd of wild horses from the dangerous EHV-1 virus.

episodes.name: True Calling
episodes.overview: Amy's dog is injured by a rancher, and it's up to Ty to save his life

episodes.name: Candles in the Wind
episodes.overview: When a mystery horse arrives at Heartland, Amy and Ty are sent down a path that will alter their lives.

episodes.name: Running Against the Wind
episodes.overview: Amy is bursting to ask Ty about the engagement ring, and why he hasn’t proposed yet, but a couple of “runaways” throw everything at Heartland into turmoil.

episodes.name: Crossed Signals
episodes.overview: Ty struggles to deal with the fact that Amy has found the engagement ring and has to decide how and whether he is going to propose to her or not.

episodes.name: Keeping up Appearances
episodes.overview: Tim hopes for a big commission when he helps a wealthy weekend cowboy look for his dream ranch, while Amy’s stuck teaching his trophy wife how to ride.

episodes.name: The Natural
episodes.overview: Tim is trying to convince Jack to be his partner in the purchase of a bison bull when Miranda comes to Heartland for a visit and goes on a trail ride with Tim that could totally change their family dynamic.

episodes.name: Trial Run
episodes.overview: Janice brings Cisco Kid (and her emotional baggage over Tim) to Heartland for Amy to figure out why Cisco's lost that winning feeling.

episodes.name: Helping Hands
episodes.overview: Amy seeks out an up-and-coming show jumper to learn why he's refusing Scott and Ty's suggested treatment for his horse.

episodes.name: Life is a Highway
episodes.overview: Chase Powers returns to Heartland with an aspiring liberty horse rider (Hayley) who wants Amy to be her coach.

episodes.name: Do the Right Thing
episodes.overview: When Ty needs some engine parts for his broken down truck he's forced to turn to the last person on earth he wants help from - his stepfather, Wade.

episodes.name: Great Expectations
episodes.overview: A trip to help out an old friend at a fishing camp doesn't go as planned, and a series of unexpected events elevate it into a life-changing weekend for the entire family.

episodes.name: The Road Ahead
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty hold off telling the family their great news when they return from their trip to find everyone reeling from the devastating fire at Lou and Peter's home.

episodes.name: Blowing Smoke
episodes.overview: Jeremy forces Amy to make a tough decision about Phoenix when his horse, Buckingham, sustains a serious injury that threatens his jumping career.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: When a local horse show is cancelled Lou saves the day for Georgie and Mallory by stepping up to host it at Heartland.

episodes.name: Waiting For Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Scott discovers that Spartan has a broken leg and Amy is forced to make the toughest decision of her life.

episodes.name: Lost and Gone Forever
episodes.overview: Ty's future as a vet is in jeopardy when there's a fatality at Scott's clinic.

episodes.name: After All We Have Been Through
episodes.overview: In an effort to prove Jeremy was responsible for Buckingham's death, Ty searches for evidence.

episodes.name: Born to Buck
episodes.overview: Amy is having trouble dealing with a roping horse that only wants to buck and Caleb, who isn't sure he wants to ride broncs anymore.

episodes.name: Breaking Point
episodes.overview: Amy and Lou help Georgie regain her confidence as a showjumper when Olivia makes her question her place in the family.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: With the threat of losing Phoenix looming over their heads, things become even more complicated at Heartland when Georgie gets a surprise visit from her brother Jeff.

episodes.name: Picking Up the Pieces
episodes.overview: As the family struggles to cope with recent changes at the ranch, Amy realizes she must reclaim her "Miracle Girl" status and focus on her work with horses.

episodes.name: Living the Moment
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty find their dream ranch while Peter tries to mediate for Georgie and Olivia.

episodes.name: Wrecking Ball
episodes.overview: Tim tries to change Maggie's into a soulless fast food franchise putting Lou and Tim on opposite sides.

episodes.name: The Penny Drops
episodes.overview: Mallory questions her choices when she finds out that Jake is planning to leave while Amy and Ty work with a mare and foal.

episodes.name: Thread the Needle
episodes.overview: Amy tries to help an RCMP constable fulfill his dream of performing in the RCMP Musical Ride.

episodes.name: Now or Never
episodes.overview: After seeing a client trick riding, Georgie is determined to pursue it despite Lou's objections.

episodes.name: Best Man
episodes.overview: Ty is torn between his past and his family at Heartland when an old friend asks him for help.

episodes.name: Hotshot
episodes.overview: Jack and Georgie end up in a bad situation during a fishing trip.

episodes.name: There But for Fortune
episodes.overview: Amy's success with a show jumper puts her life at risk.

episodes.name: Darkness and Light
episodes.overview: Family members are pitted against each other over Amy’s medical treatment as she struggles to come to terms with her injuries and uncertain future.

episodes.name: Better Days
episodes.overview: Amy is forced to face her fears and save the life of the horse that injured her.

episodes.name: Walking Tall
episodes.overview: Amy goes under cover to catch a Tennessee Walker's abusers after Ty brings it to Heartland to recover.

episodes.name: Lost Highway
episodes.overview: Amy works with a horse to help it overcome its fear of water, but sparks fly when Jack learns the horse is owned by a former flame.

episodes.name: Things We Lost
episodes.overview: Jack and Lisa are lost in the woods, but a trip down memory lane may just help them find their way.

episodes.name: Smoke 'n Mirrors
episodes.overview: Amy tries to help Tim as he goes through a mid-life crisis and buys a hot horse instead of a traditional hot car.

episodes.name: The Comeback Kid
episodes.overview: Since her accident, Amy's client list has dwindled to nearly nothing, so she holds a comeback clinic to restart her career.

episodes.name: On the Line
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty argue over Ty's investment in a horse; Amy begins working with Prince Ahmed.

episodes.name: Be Careful What You Wish For
episodes.overview: After working with Ty and Caleb's barrel-racing horse, Amy competes in a high-stakes Futurity.

episodes.name: There and Back Again
episodes.overview: Amy returns from Europe but finds herself struggling to integrate back into life at Heartland and her relationship with Ty.

episodes.name: The Big Red Wall
episodes.overview: Lou throws herself into party planning and forces Jack to meet with an old acquaintance.

episodes.name: Severed Ties
episodes.overview: Lavish gifts from afar put more distance between Amy and Georgie.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: A surprising visitor at Heartland makes a unwelcome declaration. Amy is forced to deal with the devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Endings and Beginnings
episodes.overview: Amy struggles to pair up some horses. Then is forced to go head to head with a rival trainer.

episodes.name: Steal Away
episodes.overview: Amy blames Georgie and Jade when a clients horse keeps escaping. She then re-evaluates things when she learns the horse has hidden skills.

episodes.name: Walk a Mile
episodes.overview: Amy struggles when she tries to help a Hutterite family who's Percherons have run amok during a hayride.

episodes.name: The Family Tree
episodes.overview: Georgie's life at Heartland could change forever when a school project opens a door.

episodes.name: The Pike River Cull
episodes.overview: When a threat of a cull looms over a herd of wild horses, Jack and Amy go to the aid of an old friend in Pike River.

episodes.name: The Heart of a River
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty find themselves drawing closer as they make a desperate bid to save the wild horses.

episodes.name: The Silent Partner
episodes.overview: A client reveals that Peter turned down a job offer, leaving Amy in a difficult position.

episodes.name: Broken Heartland
episodes.overview: When Amy is invited to do a horse clinic in Montana, she and Ty decide to take a road trip together, but an unexpected encounter derails their plans.

episodes.name: Cowgirls Don't Cry
episodes.overview: Tim opens a rodeo school, determined to help young people avoid injury while getting the training they need, but is immediately confronted with a problem student.

episodes.name: Riders on the Storm
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty help Scott’s nephew realize he is worthy of continuing his family tradition of relay racing.

episodes.name: Eclipse of the Heart
episodes.overview: Lou returns from Vancouver with an admission that threatens to change the Heartland family forever.

episodes.name: Faking It
episodes.overview: The family strives to support a devastated Georgie when Lou and Peter are forced to tell her distressing news.

episodes.name: All I need is You
episodes.overview: Lou spearheads preparations for the big day while Amy throws herself into gentling a rescue horse in order to avoid all the craziness.

episodes.name: Written in Stone
episodes.overview: In order to give Amy and Ty the wedding they really want, Lou struggles to deal with a slew of last minute hurdles.

episodes.name: Brave New World
episodes.overview: While a dangerous bear lurks near Heartland, Ty and Amy are back from their honeymoon and adding on the loft, Georgie is trying to be able to handle what is going on with Lou and Peter. Amy and Georgie find a hurt horse.

episodes.name: Begin Again
episodes.overview: As Ty prepares to celebrate an important milestone, he works to treat an abandoned horse’s rain rot while Amy focuses on how to heal the animal’s emotional scars. Jack uses a supposed arthritic knee as an excuse to justify his unwillingness to ride. Lou and Georgie disagree about riding lessons for Katie, but share a genuine mother-daughter moment.

episodes.name: Riding for a Fall
episodes.overview: After enlisting Amy to help her perfect a trick to perform at an upcoming rodeo, Georgie gets pulled away by Lou and Peter who insist she focus on her schoolwork.

episodes.name: Ties of the Earth
episodes.overview: Everyone rallies around Jack as he struggles with the inevitable loss of a friend. Georgie gets some unwanted help with her schoolwork.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle
episodes.overview: As Amy and Georgie prepare to compete in a cowboy competition, Georgie guilts Jack into helping her train on a new horse in the hopes he will fall in love with the animal.

episodes.name: Over and Out
episodes.overview: Ty and Amy's attempt to rescue an injured eagle in the mountains takes a dangerous turn.

episodes.name: Fearless
episodes.overview: Amy helps a Medieval jouster who was badly injured during a competition regain his confidence so he can compete again.

episodes.name: Reckless Abandon
episodes.overview: Amy's attempts to help Georgie deal with an impending departure are complicated by Olivia.

episodes.name: A Matter of Trust
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty work together to determine why Caleb’s horse becomes ill during his treatment at Heartland. Meanwhile, Georgie pits her parents against each other to get permission to go on an “away” trip with some girls from the Extreme Team. While Jack and Tim work together to bring the loft up to code as ordered by the insurance inspector, they discover unexpected interlopers.

episodes.name: Darkness Before Dawn
episodes.overview: Georgie begins to second-guess her decision to run away from Heartland, while the family bands together to find her.

episodes.name: Making the Grade
episodes.overview: When Ty helps Jack and Tim on a cattle drive, an accident jeopardizes their plans.

episodes.name: The Real Deal
episodes.overview: Tim asks Amy and Georgie for help to discourage Jade from accepting a suspicious sponsorship deal.

episodes.name: Risky Business
episodes.overview: Amy and Cass work together to save a racehorse with a career-ending condition, while the arrival of a former girlfriend forces Tim to see his current relationship in a new light.

episodes.name: No Regrets
episodes.overview: Georgie’s school project on Val Stanton inspires her to take a risk with Adam.

episodes.name: Making a Move
episodes.overview: When Lou returns from New York she is forced to confront two interlopers: Heartland’s new ranch hand, and a trendy food truck that is threatening Maggie’s business.

episodes.name: Pandora's Box
episodes.overview: Lou finds herself trapped at the Dude Ranch with Mitch, the new ranch hand, and they both reveal the circumstances of their recent pasts.

episodes.name: Love is Just a Word
episodes.overview: While trying to help Cass learn to handle a spirited horse, Amy discovers there is more riding on their success than she initially realized.

episodes.name: Resolutions
episodes.overview: When their plans to get away are thwarted, Amy and Ty celebrate their first anniversary closer to home and Amy unveils a special surprise.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: Season nine of Heartland finds the Bartlett-Fleming clan navigating the new normal as each family member starts an exciting chapter, leaving past hurt and hardships behind. With the idyllic Alberta foothills as their backdrop, this tightknit family knows that any challenge can be met and every struggle can be overcome as long as they have each other.

episodes.name: There Will Be Changes
episodes.overview: As Amy and Ty prepare for parenthood, they work together to resolve a dangerous pregnancy issue. Meanwhile, Georgie may be forced to give up something she loves when a demanding new Extreme Team coach arrives on the scene. Then, Lou has to decide whether she should tackle a new business venture that may take her away from the Heartland family. When Jack and Mitch work together with the herd, Tim is not ready to be pushed aside. And Georgie and Adam find the perfect way to celebrate an anniversary.

episodes.name: You Just Know
episodes.overview: Ty performs surgery on a mare, while Amy and the family work to bottle-feed its twin foals.

episodes.name: New Kid in Town
episodes.overview: Tim is caught in the middle of Jade's showdown with a new hotshot bronc rider.

episodes.name: New Horizons
episodes.overview: The Heartland family must deal with Amy and Ty's decision about their future.

episodes.name: Something to Prove
episodes.overview: When one of Tim's team-building events turns competitive, Georgie gets stuck partnering with Jade's cocky rival.

episodes.name: The Green-Eyed Monster
episodes.overview: When Amy helps a mounted archer reconnect with her horse, she also unravels the mystery behind Spartanâs recent behavior.

episodes.name: Riding Shotgun
episodes.overview: When Lou is given a horse, Amy helps her sister nurture a connection with the animal while Lou wrestles with the implications of the unexpected gift.

episodes.name: Here and Now
episodes.overview: Jack is shocked to learn the reason for an old friendâs unexpected visit to Heartland.

episodes.name: A Horse With No Rider
episodes.overview: Things turn dangerous for Amy, Tim and Georgie at a horse clinic.

episodes.name: Together, and Apart
episodes.overview: While Amy deals with the panicked horse trapped in a trailer, Georgie heads off on a desperate search for Tim. Meanwhile, Bob and Ty tackle a difficult surgery to save an endangered bear cub's life. Back at the ranch, when Amy, Tim and Georgie are late returning from a clinic, Jack and Mitch get very concerned and head off to find them. And with the help of Lou and his girls, Peter makes a choice that assures his place in the Heartland family.

episodes.name: Change of Course
episodes.overview: When Georgie unexpectedly struggles with a new challenge, Amy steps in to help her unearth the cause.

episodes.name: Sound of Silence
episodes.overview: Tragedy strikes the community. Amy and Georgie try to help Tim's traumatized barrel racing horse. Jack helps Tim, Casey and the rodeo community pulls through a devastating loss. Jade gets her pro rodeo permit.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: An unexpected guest arrives which makes Amy and Jack question the reason behind the visit.

episodes.name: Written In The Stars
episodes.overview: Jake's unexpected arrival at Heartland forces Mallory to admit to Amy and Jack the real reason she came back to Heartland.

episodes.name: Forest For The Trees
episodes.overview: Amy struggles with the feeling that something is not right with Ty while she and Jack strive to help the ghost horse.

episodes.name: A Long Shot
episodes.overview: A secret from Jack's past threatens to change his relationship with the family forever.

episodes.name: Dreamer
episodes.overview: Amy and the family pull together as the gravely ill Ty returns home and is admitted to hospital.

episodes.name: Greater Expectations
episodes.overview: With Caleb and Cassandra's wedding as well as the birth of Amy and Ty's baby on the horizon, everyone is rushing to make sure both events go down without a hitch.

episodes.name: Baby on Board
episodes.overview: Ty struggles with control issues when his mom stops by for an unexpected visit hoping to bond with her granddaughter, and Amy is forced to mediate.

episodes.name: Highs and Lows
episodes.overview: The family bands together to support Georgie as she decides whether to face a ghost from her past or leave it behind.

episodes.name: Decision Time
episodes.overview: Tim steps up Jade's training regimen when a fierce new competitor shows her up at practice.

episodes.name: How to Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty work together to prepare a wild horse for overseas transport, but the horse’s temperament may be more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Measuring Up
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty work together to prepare a wild horse for overseas transport, but the horse’s temperament may be more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: The family bands together to support Georgie as she decides whether to face a ghost from her past, or leave it behind.

episodes.name: Our Sons and Daughters
episodes.overview: Amy tries to teach some old friends about the power of connecting to a horse.

episodes.name: Truth Be Told
episodes.overview: Amy tries to teach some old friends about the life-changing power of connecting to a horse.

episodes.name: Challenges
episodes.overview: Amy tries to get everything organized at Heartland before joining Ty on a work-related journey, but Tim's concerns about the trip threaten to derail Amy's plans.

episodes.name: A Fine Balance
episodes.overview: Ty finds himself in a dangerous situation and in order to save him Amy must turn to an unexpected source for guidance.

episodes.name: Somewhere in Between
episodes.overview: Tim is forced to open up when an emergency traps him with an unexpected visitor. Amy is hired to work with a former racehorse in need of a new owner. Meanwhile, Georgie has trouble deciding who to trust when Wyatt warns her of a possible betrayal. And Jack steps out of his comfort zone to support Lisa, but trouble arises when her ex-husband Dan makes an appearance.

episodes.name: Out of the Shadows
episodes.overview: Struggling with personal issues, Tim rallies the family to go on another memorial ride for Marion so he can face his deepest regret. Meanwhile, Georgie is forced to make a very difficult decision when Val questions Amy’s ability to be her show jumping coach. Tim pushes Jade to accept a huge scholarship opportunity down in Texas, while Jack pushes Tim to finally be honest with Amy and Lou about his health issue.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: As the family struggles to deal with Tim’s news, Lou throws herself into planning her high school reunion to impress an old rival. Meanwhile, Amy tries to stay focused as Georgie comes up against an unexpected challenge while beginning to train with Phoenix. And Jack fights to control his own emotions as Mitch pressures him to discuss the future of the cattle business with Tim.

episodes.name: Past Imperfect
episodes.overview: A threat from Ty’s past arrives in Hudson, putting the entire Heartland family in danger. Meanwhile, in the wake of an unexpected romantic encounter, Lou struggles with insecurities about her failed relationships, and Georgie worries about Adam’s reaction when she tells him about her new status with Wyatt. And a worried Jack sticks close to Amy as they prepare for winter at the ranch.

episodes.name: Strength of Bonds
episodes.overview: As Thanksgiving approaches, Georgie puts her personal feelings about Peyton Westfield aside and convinces Amy to work with a high strung and dangerous jumping horse. Meanwhile, Jade returns from Texas for the holiday weekend and Tim is forced to admit why he was so adamant she accept the rodeo scholarship. Wyatt goes completely overboard trying to prove his affection for Georgie and it lands them in a comical but compromising situation. And when Lou can’t make it home for Thanksgiving, Jack and Lisa try to save tradition by coercing a secret family recipe out of her.

episodes.name: A Place to Call Home
episodes.overview: A training accident results in serious injury and Georgie becomes conflicted when an unlikely ally arrives at Heartland to show support.

episodes.name: Doubt
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of a vicious viral video, Georgie reconsiders her future in show jumping… and in Hudson. Meanwhile, Amy and Ty are of differing opinions about what to do with their new land. A lucrative business opportunity puts Jack, Mitch and Tim at odds. And Lou struggles with how to support her daughter through a difficult time.

episodes.name: Naming Day
episodes.overview: In the days leading up to baby Lyndy's naming ceremony, the Heartland family members find themselves keeping secrets from each other.

episodes.name: Dare to Dream
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty care for a wild mare and her foal, which provides a solution to their parenting problems.

episodes.name: Hearts Run Free
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty plan a romantic trip to Pike River, but Jack tags along to visit an old friend.

episodes.name: Just Breathe
episodes.overview: Ty is asked to mentor a troubled kid, but finding common ground proves harder than he expected. Meanwhile, Lou organizes a horse yoga retreat at the Dude Ranch, but she is taken by surprise when she learns who the instructor is and this subsequently leads to hijinks between Georgie and Wyatt. And as Amy works with a restless yoga horse she learns the real reason her dad is so keen on helping Jack and Ty build a treehouse for Lyndy.

episodes.name: Risk and Reward
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty take Lyndy on her first camping trip, but things go awry when they find an injured animal along the way. Meanwhile, when Jade takes a bad fall in a bronc riding accident, Tim and Georgie must convince her to see a doctor before she ends up in a dangerous situation. And when Georgie starts working with her new coach, the advice she’s given leaves her questioning her priorities. At the same time, Tim makes a nuisance of himself in his new home, causing Jack to call him out.

episodes.name: Change of Heart
episodes.overview: Georgie asks Wyatt to help him reunite a famous rider and her long-lost horse.

episodes.name: Diamond in the Rough
episodes.overview: When the new manager at Fairfield comes to them with an unusual concern, Amy and Ty find themselves at odds about how best to treat her horse. Meanwhile, Lou and Peter don't see eye to eye when Georgie is offered a life-changing opportunity. And Jack and Mitch disagree on the best recipe for success at an important business meeting.

episodes.name: Running Scared
episodes.overview: Amy and Tim organize a team penning event for the family, but Tim manages to turn it into a town spectacle.

episodes.name: Stress Fractures
episodes.overview: Lou returns with an idea to attract guests.

episodes.name: Long Road Back
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty work together to treat a doped racehorse, but when it turns into a race against the clock Amy looks to an unexpected source for help.

episodes.name: All Hearts Lead Home
episodes.overview: The family searches for ways to cope with its grief after getting devastating news.

episodes.name: Room to Grow
episodes.overview: The family helps Will Vernon round up his wild horses.

episodes.name: Snakes and Ladders
episodes.overview: A disgruntled horse owner causes problems for Ty and Amy's business, and they find themselves at odds about taking him on as a client.

episodes.name: Wild One
episodes.overview: Amy is hired to gentle one of the wild horses, but his temperament may prove impossible to work with.

episodes.name: Rearview Mirror
episodes.overview: Jack is faced with painful memories from his past, and the family is at a loss for how to help him.

episodes.name: The Eye of the Storm
episodes.overview: A dangerous windstorm wreaks havoc on Hudson.

episodes.name: Fairytale
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty worry about the impact a surprise visitor will have on Luke.

episodes.name: A Time To Remember
episodes.overview: Georgie's graduation has finally arrived but so has a mysterious figure from her past.

episodes.name: The Art of Trust
episodes.overview: Amy is asked to spend time at an art retreat to work with an artist's allegedly traumatized horse.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: Tim is organizing an important rodeo when an old flame blows back into Hudson asking for his help.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Amy and Ty get some unexpected news about Luke just as Amy has to face an upsetting truth about Spartan.

episodes.name: The Passing of the Torch
episodes.overview: When fears of holding on or letting go grip the family, they look to each other for support through dangerous challenges. Season finale.

episodes.name: Keep Me in Your Heart
episodes.overview: The past year has brought unexpected change to the Heartland family. While Amy deals with a major upheaval in her life, Lou copes with the reality of being the mayor of Hudson, and Georgie revisits her dream of the Olympics.

episodes.name: The Last Goodbye
episodes.overview: Amy must face a difficult truth when her efforts to help a young girl form a connection with her new horse takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Lou faces harsh criticism as mayor, and a cattle drive brings up difficult memories for Jack.

episodes.name: Making Amends
episodes.overview: Amy grudgingly helps Ty's mother Lily with a traumatized racehorse. Lou gets into even more hot water when she tries to sell Hudson as a "must see" tourist destination.

episodes.name: Through the Smoke
episodes.overview: Disaster strikes Hudson when a train derails and causes an explosion that threatens the town; a wild fire quickly spreads toward the rodeo grounds and, Amy rushes to save the abandoned horses there.

episodes.name: Outsiders
episodes.overview: The wild, black stallion that Amy rehomed from Will's ranch is brutally forced out of the herd by the new leader, leaving Amy to track down the injured horse and nurse him back to health.

episodes.name: The New Normal
episodes.overview: When a group of wild horses need new homes, Amy must get back to her Miracle Girl roots and host her first horse clinic in over a year.

episodes.name: Courage
episodes.overview: Tim seeks out help from an unlikely person when he finds himself competing in a polo match; Amy is concerned her daughter isn't adjusting well to her new reality; she makes a decision that worries Jack.

episodes.name: Changing Gears
episodes.overview: Caleb finds a memento from the past that he thinks will have special meaning for Amy. But surprisingly, it's Jack who has some mixed emotions stirred up by the gift.

episodes.name: Find Me in the Dark
episodes.overview: Quinn's wealthy father arrives at Heartland with a life-changing proposition for both Amy and his son.

episodes.name: Staying the Course
episodes.overview: Amy works with a challenging horse to help a friend of Clint's. She also revives a dream to rebuild the jumping course that she and Spartan practiced on so many years ago.

episodes.name: Moving Toward the Light
episodes.overview: Amy must help a skeptical performer, and her pair of matched liberty horses work together again.

episodes.name: Runaway
episodes.overview: A wild stallion escapes from Sam’s ranch during a burglary and Amy will stop at nothing to find him. Lisa’s latest business investment is at risk. Tim and Jessica adjust to life back at Heartland.

episodes.name: Bad Moon Rising
episodes.overview: Amy discovers a teen with a gift for horses at Cooper’s therapy centre, Lou is pressured to shut the centre down over recent break-ins and Lisa has Jack install a security system with Parker’s “help”.

episodes.name: Sins of a Father
episodes.overview: After a break-in at Heartland, unwelcome memories of his father flood Jack, Amy and Logan work with a wild horse, and Tim and Parker form an unlikely duo to find the stolen goods.

episodes.name: Blood and Water
episodes.overview: Amy and Shadow find themselves in jeopardy on a cattle drive. Lou feels overlooked when the issue of Heartland Beef's succession plan is raised. Parker and Katie babysit Lyndy and things go awry.

episodes.name: Happy Ever After
episodes.overview: Tim and Jessica's attempt to throw a "small party" snowballs. Lou struggles to hide a revived past relationship from the family. Amy and Logan continue to work with the wild horse.

episodes.name: Bluebird
episodes.overview: The man who shot Ty returns to Hudson and Amy and the rest of the family grapple with how to react. Jessica enlists Katie and Parker's help to deal with a demanding Dude Ranch guest while Lou is away.

episodes.name: Brand New Day
episodes.overview: Hudson hosts a lumberjack competition and Amy must retrain a Clydesdale and his owner to compete in the draft horse race. Tim throws his hat in the ring. Lou tries to avoid a date with Fred Garland.

episodes.name: The Long Game
episodes.overview: Amy enters Spartan into an endurance race after realizing he's not ready to retire, Jack is set on gentling an unbroke horse despite the danger, and Lou and Katie reveal hidden feelings while camping.

episodes.name: Leaving a Legacy
episodes.overview: Amy debates what to do when she receives money from an unexpected source. Lisa's racing plans are in jeopardy after an accident. Tim worries when Jessica is hiding something. Lou makes a big decision.

15.name: Season 15
15.overview: Amy embraces the future - raising her daughter, working with the horses who continue to heal her, branching out into a new phase of her life and profession. She is moving forward and feels determined to leave a legacy. In fact, Jack, Lisa, Lou and Tim have all decided that now is not the time to pull back, but to ramp up, to create new dreams and fulfill old ones. And, as they always do, the family will pull together to help each other...and will ultimately end up stronger than ever.

episodes.name: Something's Got to Give
episodes.overview: After another Miracle Girl moment, Amy reconsiders her role at the Youth Centre. Jack misses Lisa, especially after Tim and Jessica are forced to move into the house.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Amy's decision to work with Peyton Westfield's horse upsets Logan. Jack helps Katie find her own path. Lou has to come through for Rick.

episodes.name: On the Ropes
episodes.overview: Amy and Caleb train one of Sam's rescue horses to be a roping horse. Jack and Tim disagree about Blue's future. Katie and Logan go river rafting and end up on a bigger adventure than they expected.

episodes.name: Spark to Flame
episodes.overview: Amy's surprised to learn Finn has returned to town. Jack and Tim win Hudson's Entrepreneur of the Year Award, which leads to unexpected problems for Lou and the arrival of someone from Tim's past.

episodes.name: Higher Ground
episodes.overview: When flood evacuees come to Hudson, Amy works with a traumatized horse. Jack and Lisa help a young couple. Tim connects with an evacuee. Rick steps up in Lou's absence.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: Amy helps a unique animal from an abandoned zoo. Tim joins Jessica in New York for her art show, while trying to fix a past mistake. Jack and Lisa work through difficulties in their relationship.

episodes.name: Vigil
episodes.overview: A storm leads to a sad goodbye. Amy thinks her worst fears about Finn have come true. Lou reads Katie's journal without permission.

episodes.name: Running Down a Dream
episodes.overview: Amy teaches Lyndy how to barrel race. Logan's father arrives at Heartland. Jessica seeks distraction from a disappointment in New York. Katie gets her ears pierced, causing a fight with Lou.

episodes.name: True Colours, New Tricks
episodes.overview: Amy leads an overnight trail ride to help with Jessica's new photography job. On the ride, Amy and Jack have a disagreement about Finn. Lou's latest mayoral event upsets Rick.

episodes.name: Lurking in the Shadows
episodes.overview: Amy and Lou go on a road trip to stop a Miracle Girl imposter. Tim puts on a rodeo school showcase, but a series of mysterious events threaten the show. Amy questions if she should visit Finn.

episodes.name: Head Over Heels
episodes.overview: Amy agrees to let Logan take the lead with a new client horse. Tim goes after the person responsible for Jack's accident. Lou struggles to reconnect with Katie.

episodes.name: Memory
episodes.overview: A surprise visitor causes Amy to see Finn differently. A weekend trip to the cabin has Jack struggling with his past while Katie finally opens up. Lou and Peter's dinner party doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: Striking a Balance
episodes.overview: Amy helps Lisa with Platinum Bow. Tim has a difficult visit with Shane. Katie leads a strike at Maggie's. Jack reconnects with his country music roots.

episodes.name: After the Ever After
episodes.overview: Amy helps Georgie rediscover her passion for showjumping. Lou's surprised when Peter announces he's moving to Heartland. A Winter Fair allows Tim to help Jessica and his rodeo school.

episodes.name: A Light in the Dark
episodes.overview: Jack faces the truth about his rift with Al Cotter. Lou and Peter take the next step in their relationship. Georgie makes a decision about her future. Amy sees her own future in a new light.

16.name: Season 16
16.overview: Season 16 finds Amy and the rest of the family making bold strides towards their futures. Amy will be challenged by the horses that need her help, but she’ll also open herself up to the possibility of new friendships and maybe even romance. Amy’s daughter Lyndy will follow in her mom’s footsteps as her talents with horses start to develop over the course of the season. Jack and Lisa will find themselves living out the dreams they’ve both worked so hard to achieve. Just as Lou and Peter have recommitted as a couple, Katie will struggle to find her place in the world and in her family. Tim has never been happier in his marriage to Jessica, but a ghost from his past will force him to reconsider mistakes he made years ago and seek ways to atone for them.

episodes.name: The Path Less Traveled
episodes.overview: Amy is surprised when a very pregnant Mallory shows up at the ranch with a wild horse. Jack and Tim face new competition, and Lou grapples with a familiar opponent in her campaign to be re-elected.

episodes.name: Taking the Reins
episodes.overview: Amy and Jack retrain Edwin's horse for carriage racing, bringing Amy and Edwin closer. Logan takes on his first client horse. Election night arrives for Lou just as the family faces a difficult loss.

episodes.name: The Heart Wants
episodes.overview: Amy helps Caleb with his son's pony. Lou and Jessica start a new venture, while Katie tries a risky new hobby. Logan takes a big step in his relationship with Miley, but then disaster strikes.

episodes.name: A Piece Apart
episodes.overview: Amy must deal with Lyndy's sudden fear of horses. Logan blames himself for Miley's accident. Tim enlists the family to make Shane's return to Heartland perfect, while Katie struggles with a friendship.

episodes.name: How to Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Amy and Jack train Blue for a competition. Lisa deals with a difficult loss. Lou lets Jessica down in their partnership for the gallery. Katie secretly buys a used dirt bike.

episodes.name: Heat of the Moment
episodes.overview: At the competition, Amy has a run in with an old friend that leads to heartache. Jack and Lisa prove they can be adventurous. Katie stands up for herself when Ellie and Brandon push her too far.

episodes.name: Unknown Caller
episodes.overview: Lou's forced to face the reason for her insomnia. Amy works with a new client who has a surprising connection to Katie. Jack wins over a prickly dude ranch guest.

episodes.name: Harmony
episodes.overview: Amy helps a vaulting team ahead of a big competition. Caleb struggles with a tough decision about Carson. Logan realizes where his future lies. Lou and Jessica face a stressful gallery opening.

episodes.name: Fear is a Liar
episodes.overview: Amy and Nathan retrain his horse. Tim navigates new family dynamics when Miranda shows up early to help with Shane and Chloe's wedding. Jessica has to heal a rift with Jack.

episodes.name: Just the Beginning
episodes.overview: An accident puts Shane's wedding in jeopardy. Nathan tries to make amends with Amy while helping his traumatized horse. Heartland Beef faces an uncertain future. Katie finds a new side of herself.

episodes.name: True Grit
episodes.overview: Heartland struggles with competition from Pryce Beef just as Amy agrees to help Nathan Pryce in a sheepdog competition. Lou, Jack and Tim are feeling the strain as a water shortage is on the horizon.

episodes.name: Bird's Eye View
episodes.overview: Caleb returns to help Amy with a mysterious Icelandic horse. Weather conditions force Lou to build a firebreak with the enemy.

episodes.name: You Can Lead a Horse to Water
episodes.overview: The family faces the hard reality of a drought at Heartland and the hunt is on to find the best spot to build a new well. Katie worries about her grandfather's health.

episodes.name: Into the Unknown
episodes.overview: The weight of the Hudson rumour mill leads Jack to make a surprising decision. Amy works with a polo pony and sees a new side of Nathan in the process.

episodes.name: Fork in the Road
episodes.overview: The whole family heads to the Hudson Rodeo. Emotions run high at the barn dance after Amy helps Nathan deal with a family emergency.

episodes.name: Sisters
episodes.overview: Lou, Amy and Lisa head to Vancouver for a girls' trip. Lisa is caught in the middle when truths are revealed between sisters that could threaten to tear them apart.

episodes.name: World on a String
episodes.overview: Amy works with a unique client whose sanctuary is at risk of closure while a secret Katie's been keeping is revealed and shocks Lou.

episodes.name: Throwing Your Hat in the Ring
episodes.overview: Tensions boil over when Heartland and Pryce Beef face off at the Hudson Farmer's Market and Shane makes a surprise visit.
